channel.title: Please keep improving controller support
channel.description:
In steam release 0.1.0 of black mesa, I notice that I can now go into keyboard settings, and edit my controller bindings directly there.
This is nice and thank you for this. However, would be much nicer to have controller [b]keys mapping to be a separate menu section.[/b]
Also, in the menu navigation, controller works only when first starting black mesa. Menu navigation does not work using a controller after loading a level.
Please realize that many PC gamers actually prefer to use a controller with all their games.
I personally use xbox360 controller for windows. Steam controller is also coming out soon.
Please keep improving controller support for black mesa.

item.title: Please keep improving controller support
item.dc:creator: orudie
item.description:
While playing BM chapter missions, after being idle for a few minutes, xbox360 wireless controller automatically turns off. It is a built in function to save battery.

When this happens, black mesa resets my custom controller keys that I have specified in keyboard settings.

Will the future release of controller support and GUI include a fix to prevent controller keys from resetting?
